wrong side pin the hem in place lining an optional last step to this project is to add a lining to your bag this will make the bag sturdy and prevents the squares from stretching out over time i recommend using a cotton fabric without stretch such as quilting cotton make a pattern for your lining either by measuring your bag and drawing it out or simply tracing your bag onto paper cleaning the lines up with a ruler once you re done place the lining into the bag wong transfer the pattern onto your sides together pin it in place and fabric and cut out two pieces with sew the lining into place about 1/2 seam allowance sew with the crochet fabric on the sew together the sides bottom outside to prevent the sewing diagonals and bottom seam machine snagging on the yarn make sure you catch
